data.name: Neebota: 99 Fails
data.detailed_description:
Easy to play, impossibly difficult to master genre-bending precision platforming with charge dashing, timed stepping, bullet hell, rhythm, puzzle elements and more. Journey through Zeebo's surreal nightmare full of bizarre events and characters. Conquer different dream layers each with their own gameplay mechanic transforming Zeebo. Each mechanic will test your sense of timing, balance, aim, rhythm, and anger management skills. Use unlocked entries in the dream journal to figure out the source of Zeebo's torture.

THE FEATURES

  • Addictively easy to play. Difficult to conquer. Impossible to master.
  • Nine mechanics that morph Zeebo with several difficulty levels each.
  • Bizarre, trippy and surreal creations, events and whacky characters.
  • Dig into Zeebo's life with PC point 'n click style exploration in his bedroom in 3 acts.
  • Perform dream analysis in the dream journal to figure out what's fueling his nightmare.
  • What more do you want? More fails? Done.

THE COGNIZOIDS

Cognizoids are entities in Noobota, Zeebo's dreamworld. They represent everything from abstract concepts like death, love, to particular objects or persons from Zeebo's waking world, Neebota. They can be a person Zeebo knows, or represent his fears or joy.

THE SURREAL EVENTS

In any mechanic all sorts of weird stuf might happen apart from what you encounter on your path. The screen may freeze, you may be thrown out of your dream and have to find your way back or perhaps your suddenly back in your bedroom, but not quite awake and not quite in your actual bedroom...

THE WORLD

Zeebo's world is called Neebota and is an alternative universe. Humans don't exist there, but portals open up between our universes and going through has all sorts of unexpected consequences. There are many stories about such events. Zeebo and his friends love going to abandoned places, forests to look for portals and things from our earth. Noobota, on the other hand, is the dreamworld of any Neebotian. And it's Zeebo's Noobota you have to beat in Neebota: 99 Fails!

THE DISCLAIMER

We are not responsible for any harm that may come from playing this game. We are certainly not responsible for any rage-induced attacks on other objects, persons, or damage caused by throwing or stomping on your controller, keyboard or mouse.

data.short_description: Precision platforming with multiple genre-bending mechanics in Zeebo's surreal nightmare. Addictively easy to play, very difficult to master. Find out the source of Zeebo's torture by analyzing his dream journal as you progress.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225, AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K, Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
